articles.description: De'Jahn Warren, the No. 4-ranked junior college prospect, flipped his commitment from Georgia and will now play for head coach Deion Sanders at Jackson State.
articles.content: Deion Sanders promised he would go after big-name recruits when he was announced as Jackson State's new coach, and he is delivering on that promise -- landing a commitment from ESPN JC 50 cornerback … [+518 chars]

articles.title: Supreme Court takes up NCAA antitrust dispute over compensation for college athletes - CBS News
articles.description: The justices will likely hear arguments in the legal battle in the spring of 2021.
articles.content: Washington — The Supreme Court on Wednesday agreed to take up a dispute between the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) and a group of collegiate athletes who argue the group's rules rest… [+1937 chars]
